remarks: Isomorphism H of lattice join with an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2015.)
statement:
dihjat3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihjat3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjat3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjat3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjat3.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat3.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjat3.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat3.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjat3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
dihjat3.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. A ) $.
dihjat3 $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( X .\/ P ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) .(+) ( I ` P ) ) ) $.
